tool_description: Analyzes sample citations to automatically detect the citation style being used (APA, MLA, Chicago, etc.).

sample_citations.description: Sample citations to analyze for style detection

error_messages: Empty sample citations: Provide at least one sample citation for analysis.
Too many samples: Maximum 50 sample citations allowed for analysis.
Invalid confidence threshold: Threshold must be between 0.5 and 1.0.
Unrecognizable citation format: The provided citations don't match any known academic styles.
usage: Provide sample_citations array and optionally set confidence_threshold. The tool analyzes formatting patterns to identify the citation style.

alternative_styles.description: Other possible citation styles with lower confidence

style_features.description: Key formatting features that led to the detection
